Write a python function to calculate the average and standard deviation of a list of numbers
def avg_std(nums): 
    # Calculate the mean of the given list
    total = sum(nums)
    count = len(nums)
    
    # Calculate the variance
    variance = (sum([(x - total/count)**2 for x in nums]) / count)
    
    # Calculate the standard deviation using the formula 
    std_dev = np.sqrt(variance)
    
    return avg, std_dev

# Test the function with a given list of numbers
nums = [10,25,36,47]
avg, std_dev = avg_std(nums)
print("Average:", avg)
print("Standard deviation:", std_dev)
